CMD_AUTONUKE_DESC: Deletes and recreates the current channel
CMD_HELP_DESC: Shows the list of available commands and their usage
CMD_LANGUAGE_DESC: Configure the bot's language for this server.
CMD_PREFIX_DESC: Changes the bot prefix for this server.
CMD_BAN_DESC: Bans a user from the server
CMD_KICK_DESC: Kicks a user from the server
CMD_MUTE_DESC: Mutes a user in the server
CMD_TIMEOUT_DESC: Timeouts a user for a period of time
CMD_UNBAN_DESC: Unbans a user from the server
CMD_UNMUTE_DESC: Unmutes a user in the server
CMD_WARN_DESC: Warns a user in the server
CMD_LAVA_DESC: Shows the status of the Lavalink node
CMD_MONGO_DESC: Shows the status of the MongoDB node
CMD_UPTIME_DESC: Shows how long the bot has been running
OPT_PLATFORM_DESC: Choose a platform to play music from
OPT_ADD_AMOUNT_DESC: Enter how many tracks you want
CMD_AUCTION_DESC: Auction and bid on items in the auction market.
CMD_BUFFS_DESC: Shows your boosters and loot bonuses.
CMD_BUY_DESC: Buys a shop item by ID, name, or itemId.
CMD_CRIME_DESC: Commit a crime to try to earn coins (with risk).
CMD_CRAFT_DESC: Craft items or view the craft list.
CMD_DEPOSIT_DESC: Deposit coins from your balance into the bank.
CMD_GIFT_DESC: Gift coins or items to another user.
CMD_FISH_DESC: Go fishing! Explore zones to find rare fish and treasures.
CMD_ITEMINFO_DESC: Shows item info by ID, name, or itemId.
CMD_PET_DESC: Manage your pet and egg incubation.
CMD_USE_DESC: Use (consume) an item from your backpack.
CMD_WITHDRAW_DESC: Withdraw coins from your bank into your balance.
CMD_WORK_DESC: Work to earn coins and experience.
CMD_INVEST_DESC: Invest coins with risk to earn profit.
CMD_BLACKMARKET_DESC: Check the black market and buy daily offers.
CMD_SELL_DESC: Sell an item from your backpack for coins.
CMD_LEADERBOARD_DESC: Shows the top users by total wealth (bank + coins + sakuras).
CMD_SETTINGS_DESC: Shows economy settings and reward ranges.
CMD_SERVERSHOP_DESC: Open the server shop (currently the normal shop).
CMD_SLOTS_DESC: Play a betting minigame (redirects to roulette).
CMD_RACE_DESC: Join a race and earn coins (cooldown).
CMD_REPAIR_DESC: Repair an item using a repair kit.
CMD_QUEST_DESC: View daily quests and claim a reward.
